companyInfo.Competitors: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center, Loma Linda University Medical Center, Harbor Hospital

jobDescription: ResponsibilitiesThe Clinical Lab Scientist performs independently a wide variety of technical procedures in the Chemistry, Hematology, Coagulation, Urinalysis and Blood Bank sections of the UCLA, Santa Monica Clinical Lab. Other responsibilities include maintenance repair of laboratory instruments, sample processing, reagent preparation, training, teaching and data entry. On a daily basis, assess overall workload for any area that needs help and assist co-workers without being reassigned by the supervisor. This position includes testing of intraoperative PTH samples in the Surgery Department.
